DOC.brief_summary: Gestational diabetes mellitus ( GDM ) condition high blood sugar level occur pregnancy . GDM increase risk medical complication pregnancy may harm mother baby . Since treat GDM reduce blood sugar reduces risk harm , pregnant woman screen GDM use glucose challenge test ( GCT ) . We think diet contain low glycemic index food could help keep blood sugar level normal pregnancy therefore prevent GDM . Thus , purpose study see diet contain low glycemic index food reduce blood sugar GCT reduce prevalence GDM woman high risk development GDM .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Low Glycemic Index Diet Blood Sugar Control Pregnant Women Risk Gestational Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Attending Mt . Sinai Maternal Fetal Medicine Unit Any ONE : body mass index > =25 kg/m^2 OR age > =35 year OR high risk ethnicity ( Asian , South Asian , Hispanic , African , Aboriginal ) Have preexist diabetes ( type 1 type 2 ) become pregnant Acute chronic illness may affect carbohydrate metabolism Language/literacy barriers overcome via available resource > 16 week gestation
